dataset_fields.label: Organization
dataset_fields.help_text: Leave this field as it is

dataset_fields.label: Resource title
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: eg. Maritime transport, Coralligenous communities, Offshore sand deposits
dataset_fields.help_text: Use a title that clearly identifies the geospatial resource. If the resource is already published elsewhere, please use the original title (translated in English).

dataset_fields.label: Partner
dataset_fields.help_text: Please, do not change this value

dataset_fields.label: Resource abstract
dataset_fields.help_text: Describe in a few sentences the content and the purpose of the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Topic category
dataset_fields.help_text: High-level dataset thematic classification to assist in the grouping and search of available datasets.

dataset_fields.label: Sub category
dataset_fields.help_text: Please select a value from the following list in accordance with the selected Topic category:  https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MiIwjzaIvCBOes1zLy2kiWTy1l4g4jKGetiomdqFSaY/edit?usp=sharing

dataset_fields.label: Resource language
dataset_fields.help_text: Language of the datasets attributes.

dataset_fields.label: Owner
dataset_fields.help_text: This is a list of one or more names (e. g. Emodnet, EEA) identifying the ownership of the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Provider
dataset_fields.help_text: This is a list of one or more names (e. g. Emodnet, EEA) identifying the provider of the resource. E. g. This could be the owner of the geo-portal or SDI through which the resource is available.

dataset_fields.label: Data portal
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: eg. ADRIPLAN, SHAPE, EMODNet Human activities
dataset_fields.help_text: Portal where the dataset is published/downloadable/etc. (if any).

dataset_fields.label: Presentation form
dataset_fields.help_text: Select always  'map', unless you are referring to a non-spatial data. Please be aware that non-spatial data must be avoided and used only to report a priority spatial datasets not yet available

choices.label: Map (map represented in raster or vector form)
epsg:41001 WGS84 / Simple Mercator -- Spherical Mercator

dataset_fields.help_text: Identifier of the coordinate reference system(s) used in the data set. Only identifiers contained in the EPSG Geodetic Parameter Dataset shall be used (e.g. 4326). Refer to the following URLs for more info and to find the proper EPSG code: https://epsg.io/ or http://spatialreference.org/.
Available interoperable services to view or download the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Derives from
dataset_fields.help_text: Select related datasets

dataset_fields.label: Successor of
dataset_fields.help_text: Select related datasets

dataset_fields.label: Temporal extent
dataset_fields.help_text: Time period covered by the content of the dataset. Use this field to specify ad individual date or to specify the START date of a time period.
Use this field to specify the END date of a time period.

dataset_fields.label: Spatial extent
dataset_fields.help_text: GeoJSON feature

dataset_fields.label: Data accessibility
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: A description of the level of resource accessibility.
dataset_fields.help_text: Indicate the data accessibility: visible, downloadable, sent on request, not accessible, etc. Please add information useful to explain limitations and restrictions to access or use.

dataset_fields.label: License
dataset_fields.help_text: License definitions and additional information can be found at http://opendefinition.org/
